column6: Why are the Morlocks terrorizing innocent people?  What is their endgame?  That's what Storm and the X-Men are trying to find out.  All the while, Professor X and Nightcrawler are on the trail of Magneto!
column8: | writer:Ed Brubaker | writer:Christos Gage | penciller:Scot Eaton | letterer:Chris Eliopoulos | colorist:Jason Keith | penciller (cover):Salvador Larroca
